result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Marlene M DeMeyer
Current: 123 Railroad St, Bowler, WI 54416 United States  (Effective: 10-13-2015)
Prior: 5507 Ferge Street Apt 1, C/O  Beverly Pederson, Schofield, WI 54476 United States

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 3:03 p.m. 
**Includes 14CF243, 14CF510 & 14CF654**
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.
Defendant appears in custody with Atty Lou Ann Bohn.
Date & time set for sentencing in 14CF243.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed. 
State notes PSI has been filed and makes recommendation. Parties are in agreement to the recommendation. Court questions OWI court for defendant. Atty Bohn addresses the court. Defendant makes statement. Court makes note of PSI. 
COURT makes findings.
COURT ORDERS: Ct.1> OWI 5th-  Sentence I&S 5 years Wisconsin State Prison System, 2 1/2 years IC, 2 1/2 years ES. 3 years probation- Conditions: 12 months, 10 months imposed, 2 months stayed for rule violations) MCJ with huber for medical needs and treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification, credit for 84 days, $600.00 fine plus CC, DNA sample & DNA surcharge, $165.00 AODA fee, 36 month DL revocation with credit for any time admin. suspended, any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name are subject to IID for 36 months, as is the defendant herself, half priced IID, $50.00 IID surcharge, AODA and any follow up or treatment recommendations, 6 points on DL, absolute sobriety unless prescribed by a doctor, treatment and counseling as deemed appropriate by agent, day report program OR use of TAD monitor if agent will allow and must adhere to mental health treatment plan. PSI'S are maintained by ADA Puig and Atty Bohn. PSI ordered SEALED.
Voter Ineligibilty Notice & Acknowledgment signed and filed. 
Adj: 3:44 p.m.
bond refunded - surety withdrawn

Clerk Shirley.
Case Called: 2:28
Includes: 14CF243, 14CF510 and 14CF654 and 05CF614 Warrant 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig.  Def appears with Atty Lou Ann Bohn.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.
State moves to: 14CF243>>Count 2>>PAC>>Dismissed
Count 3>>DRI
14CF510>>Count 1>>DRI
14CF654>>Count 1>>DRI
Court grants.
PLEA: 14CF243>>Count 1>>OWI 5th>>No Contest
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: PSI to be done, Sentencing will be argued in about 60 days or ASAP. Defendant remanded in to custody at MCJ w/huber for medical treatment and elder care of her mother if eligible.
05CF614>>BW quashed-Payment officer to meet the Defendant while in custody.
Adj: 2:47
and Demand for Discovery & Inspection

Clerk Shirley
Case called: 10:06
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo, Defendant appears with Atty Lou Ann Bohn.
Time set for Defendant's change of plea in 14CF243 to NGI. Preliminary hearings in 14CF654 and 14CF510
Atty Bohn states that she has not filed a petition and will not be pursuing an NGI
Waiver of Prelim. filed in 14CF654 and 14CF510.
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for trial.  
Information to be filed by the end of the day.
Plea: Not Guilty entered in each case
Dates to be set.
Bond:  Continued
Adj: 10:12
